articles.title: Celebrity beauty files: Actress Jeanette Aw reveals what she packs inside her travel kit - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: “I pack my entire skincare kit when I travel, everything that I use at home goes with me.” Which comes in handy when she's busy travelling to Japan to build up her bakery brand Once Upon A Time.
articles.content: With actress Jeanette Aw, what you see is literally what you get. Her almost Zen-like vibe is a reflection of the calm that resides within her. Not one to get all dramatic (unless it's for the camera… [+448 chars]
